definition: to treat differently/another cup of tea
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Whether you deserve their sacrifice is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 而你是否值得他们的牺牲就另当别论了。

sentences.english: Just married man still eager for action, or strong had strong to be another matter.
sentences.chinese: 只是已婚男子还蠢蠢欲动，或强占强霸就另当别论了。

sentences.english: Unless, of course, you have an interest at stake.
sentences.chinese: 当然，如果威胁到你的利益，就得另当别论。

sentences.english: Whether they can sustain their form to mount a title challenge, though, is a different matter.
sentences.chinese: 他们是否能够保持状态向冠军发起冲击则另当别论。
但爸爸们就另当别论了。

definition: most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
needless to say/it goes without saying
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
